title: Thursday Post Show (5-13-21)
itunes:title: Thursday Post Show (5-13-21)
description:
Bobby talks to Lunchbox about his car dying last night on the side of the road. Turns out the tow truck driver was a big fan of the show and gave him a ride. Bobby also talks about how he never thought marriage was in his courts. Plus a list of the grossest states in the United States and why you shouldn’t put your suitcase on the bag.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
